summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: frontend Location section displays the exact fallback address string when profile/address is missing and formats structured address as "{street}, {city}, {region}, {country}"; backend defaultAddress fields are updated to street="Jandi Mor, GT road", city="Gujar Khan", region="Punjab", country="Pakistan". However, the diff introduces an additional backend module (migration.mo) and wires a migration hook into backend/main.mo, which was not requested and conflicts with the constraint to keep the backend as a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo with no additional backend services/modules.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend migration module and wired a migration hook into the main actor (upgrade migration support).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints specify the backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services). Adding backend/migration.mo and importing/using it is extra functionality not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2 and appears to violate the constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced project tracking metadata file (project_state.json) and frontend file summaries document.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest requirements (only address/location updates were requested).
